Header.title: Sem Spices and Catering
Header.paragraph: Are you a health enthusiasts, you want to live healthy and make healthier choices? Then sem food and spices is your nunmber 1 plug. Sem Spices are made from a 100% blend of natural herbs and roots, they are free from monosodium Glutamate MSG, preservatives or any form of artificial additives

About.paragraph: Sem spices are made from a 100% natural blend of herbs, roots and spices. They are free from monosodium Glutamate MSG preservatives, or any form of artificial additives They do not only make your food taste better but also help you prevent, manage or cure certain health conditions. Apart from the spice Production we also run an msg free catering classes. It's not enough to have the Spice, you need to know the right proportion per meal. The msg free catering classes are targeted at people with health conditions, we have reversed diabetes and cholesterol issues with our meal plans among other things.

Services.name: Spices
Services.text: All varieties of healthy spices, such as can be gotten from us and all at a very low price .

Services.name: Granular
Services.text: for some grainy food, as far as health is concerned buss us.

Services.name: Teas
Services.text: Our healthy tea ranges can cure different ailments that normal prescribed medicines might not help on.

Services.name: Msg-Free-Catering(Training)
Services.text: we train too on how to use these spices and the qautities per meal to get the best out of it.

Services.name: Msg-Free-Catering(Food)
Services.text: We also cater for events and ocassions.

Services.name: Farm
Services.text: With our partners farm produce can be sourced through us.

Features.title: Home Delivery
Features.text: With our great team and partners we deliver at your door step within a given time and anywhere .

Features.title: Consultations
Features.text: We are always open to hear and listen to you on any matter concerning your food health.

Features.text: We can cover our ocasions and events anytime anyhwere just drop us a call.
